this_title: Power Trip: the Story of Energy
introduction: Power Trip: The Story of Energy" uncovers the hidden energy that is embedded in our modern way of life, revealed as the underlying force behind our water, food, wealth, cities, transportation and war. Filmed around the world, the six-part documentary series takes viewers on a journey through the past, present and future of energy. Filmed across Asia, the Middle East, Europe, the USA, and Singapore. Featuring interviews with former secretary of Energy Ernest Moniz, author Bryan Burrough, author Kate Williams (BBC), Dr. Michael E. Webber, and more
chinese_title: Power Trip: the Story of Energy
